default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

schema.description: Error response indicates that the service is not able to process the incoming request. The reason is provided in the error message.

message.description: Error message indicating why the operation failed.

target.description: The target of the particular error.

description.description: Full error message if any compatibility issues are found

isCompatible.description: Tells if product is compatible with current device

ExtendedProduct.description: Extended description about the product required for installing it into Azure Stack.

galleryPackageBlobSasUri.description: The URI to the .azpkg file that provides information required for showing product in the gallery.

productKind.description: Specifies the kind of the product (virtualMachine or virtualMachineExtension).

properties.description: Specifies additional properties describing the product.

etag.description: The entity tag used for optimistic concurrency when modifying the resource.

ProductLink.description: Link with additional information about a product.

uri.description: The URI corresponding to the link.

ProductNestedProperties.description: Properties portion of the product resource.

billingPartNumber.description: The part number used for billing purposes.

displayName.description: The display name of the product.

galleryItemIdentity.description: The identifier of the gallery item corresponding to the product.

iconUris.description: Additional links available for this product.

links.description: Additional links available for this product.

offerVersion.description: The version of the product offer.

productKind.description: The kind of the product (virtualMachine or virtualMachineExtension)

publisherDisplayName.description: The user-friendly name of the product publisher.

vmExtensionType.description: The type of the Virtual Machine Extension.

computeRole.description: Specifies kind of compute role included in the package.

isSystemExtension.description: Specifies if product is a Virtual Machine Extension.

sourceBlob.description: Specifies a download location where content can be downloaded from.

supportMultipleExtensions.description: Indicates if specified product supports multiple extensions.

vmOsType.description: Specifies operating system used by the product.

vmScaleSetEnabled.description: Indicates if virtual machine Scale Set is enabled in the specified product.

osDiskImage.description: OS disk image used by product.
